version_description:
- Fixed most of crashes and the app now is stable.

Enjoy using Focos and support us by leaving your review for the features of each update to help us make it better.

- Both the "radial" & "swirl" options can be applied in lens tool to achieve the whirlpool bokeh. You can try this effect in the sample lens "A5".
- Added support for iPhone 12 and 12 Pro. Developers cannot access the night mode API, but you may use system camera app to take portrait photos at night, then edit photos in Focos app for better bokeh effect.
- Hair optimization has been removed since it's not working 100% perfectly. Sometimes glitches come while taking photos under trees.
- The new version remembers the depth map calculated by AI engine for faster loading photos.
- Issue of gradient map moving while painting in the patch tool has been fixed.

Enjoy using Focos and support us by leaving your review for the features of each update to help us make it better.

- Both the "radial" & "swirl" options can be applied in lens tool to achieve the whirlpool bokeh. You can try this effect in the sample lens "A5".
- Added support for iPhone 12 and 12 Pro. Developers cannot access the night mode API, but you may use system camera app to take portrait photos at night, then edit photos in Focos app for better bokeh effect.
- Hair optimization has been removed since it's not working 100% perfectly. Sometimes glitches come while taking photos under trees.
- The new version remembers the depth map calculated by AI engine for faster loading photos.
- Issue of gradient map moving while painting in the patch tool has been fixed.
- Fix the issue that the patch tool does not work on iOS 12.

Enjoy using Focos and support us by leaving your review for the features of each update to help us make it better.

- With newly designed home page, it is easier to choose photos from albums for editing with bokeh effect. In addition, you are now able to open photos directly from Files app.
- Support for RAW and ProRAW formats added. You can now adjust exposure / temperature / tone map losslessly & check EXIF before importing RAW images to the editing interface.
- Maximum support of 20M pixels as output resolution on most devices.
- Enhanced editing interface designed for iPad with new slider control.
- The eraser returns to the patch tool and also brings a new "restore" brush.
- Left handed editing mode for iPad added. Appreciation for Luis Maldonado.
- Issue of foreground bokeh with wavy lines fixed.
- Interface stuck issue after sharing images to other apps fixed.

Enjoy using Focos and support us by leaving your review for the features of each update to help us make it better.

- Maximum support of 20M pixels as output resolution on most devices.
- Enhanced editing interface designed for iPad with new slider control.
- The eraser returns to the patch tool and also brings a new "restore" brush.
- Left handed editing mode for iPad added. Appreciation for Luis Maldonado.
- Issue of foreground bokeh with wavy lines fixed.
- Interface stuck issue after sharing images to other apps fixed.
- Fixed the issue of the version 2.4.

Enjoy using Focos and support us by leaving your review for the features of each update to help us make it better.

- Interface stuck issue after sharing images to other apps fixed.
- Fix the issues of slowly browsing albums & camera options in landscape mode.

Enjoy using Focos and support us by leaving your review for the features of each update to help us make it better.

- Added support for RAW+JPEG format, and you may choose one of them for editing.
- Try to expand the maximum output resolution to 24 million pixels (6000x4000).

Enjoy using Focos and support us by leaving your review for the features of each update to help us make it better.
